name: Lacrimosa
description:
Lacrimosa is an interactive Twine version of a short horror story with the same name that I wrote and revised in the fall of 2014. It is, at its core, the story of a man pushed to absolute limits by an inexplicable, supernatural force. Set just outside the town of Antlers in the year 1998, Lacrimosa functions both as a standalone story and a companion piece to my serial web story Antlers, Colorado, which you can read here.

Content warnings for Lacrimosa include: graphic descriptions of violence, suicide, and drowning.
